entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [API Proposal]: Consistent interface members #72648
  • Interfaces don't forward static members to other interfaces #72646
  • linux ARM64 dotnet7 regression preview 4 to preview 5 and also in preview 6 #72645
  • Reachable assert in SubjectIdentifier MatchesCertificate #72642
  • [mono][wasi] Add a CI lane to compile wasi runtime and run a sample #72641
    7.0.0
  • dotnet global tools install problem in Amazon Linux Arm64 #72636
  • Getting a runtime crash with the interpreter and 7.0 Preview 7 #72635
  • Uri.IsWellFormedOriginalString false negatives #72632
  • [API Proposal]: `ImmutableArray<T>.Builder.ToImmutableAndClear()` #72625
  • MarshallingAttributeAnalyzers throws InvalidOperationException #72622
    7.0.0
  • [HTTP/3] Stress test failures for GET Aborted scenario #72619
  • JsonTypeInfo generated using JsonSourceGenerationMode.Serialization throws NotSupportedException on configuration #72614
    7.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Expose signature and protected headers raw bytes #72611
    7.0.0
  • .NET not properly shut down when using a mixed-mode assembly in a native process #72610
  • [QUIC] Should QuicStream cancellation abort? #72607
    8.0.0
  • [wasm-mt] Hook up webworker console to xharness websockets #72606
    8.0.0
  • Polymorphic Deserialization throws if $type metadata isn't present at the start of the object #72604
    Future
  • Debugger fails to attach to a specific application with CORDBG_E_MISSING_DEBUGGER_EXPORTS on macOS. #72603
  • Use MatchingRefApiCompatBaseline.txt of libraries for CoreLib #72595
  • Make public surface area of different CoreLibs consistent #72594
  • [API Proposal]: PipeStream.WaitForPipeDrainAsync(CancellationToken cancellationToken) #72593
    Future
  • WindowsSerivceLifetime is broken #72590
  • Implement static virtual reabstraction/diamond case #72589
    7.0.0
  • Long running test: ReadAsync_CancelPendingTask_ThrowsCancellationException #72586
    7.0.0
  • System.InvalidOperationException: 'overlapped' has already been freed. at System.Threading.ThreadPoolBoundHandleOverlapped.CompletionCallback(UInt32 , UInt32 , NativeOverlapped* ) at System.Threading._IOCompletionCallback.PerformIOCompletionCallback(UInt32 , UInt32 , NativeOverlapped* ) #72644
  • Profiling x64 processes can’t resolve R2R symbols #72578
    7.0.0
  • The Enumerable.Chunk can leak memory (.NET 7) #72577
    7.0.0
  • Investigate getting rid of reflection blocking #72570
    7.0.0

Closed

  • additionalProbingPaths uses the current directory instead of directory where .runtimeconfig.json is #72571
  • "The 'libs' subset must be built before building this project" when subset has been built #36528
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed '!compDonotInline()' during 'Morph - Inlining' #64787
    7.0.0
  • Segmentation fault linux since net 6 upgrade #69323
    6.0.x
  • [wasm] `STJ.Serialization.Tests` failing with `System.NotSupportedException` with AOT #71838
  • System.Threading.RateLimiting.Tests.PartitionedRateLimiterTests.AllIdleLimitersCleanedUp_DisposeThrows failed in rolling build on net7.0-windows-Release-x86-CoreCLR_checked-Windows.10.Amd64.Open #72060
    7.0.0
  • Bug of Uri #64249
    7.0.0
  • Confusing behavior of Uri.IsWellFormedUriString in .Net Core and .Net Framework #37634
    Future
  • .NET Core 3.1.2's Uri.IsWellFormedUriString returns false instead of true even though the Url is correct. #34031
    Future
  • Uri.IsWellFormedUriString false negative #70929
  • [Uri] Uri.IsWellFormedUriString() returns false for a URL which is correct #21626
    7.0.0
  • Bad test input in `UpgradeToRegexGeneratorAnalyzerTests` #72544
    Future
  • system.io.pipes.tests work item timeout when running long running test #72585
    Future
  • `dotnet new wasmbrowser` template papercuts #72624
  • Don't guard Dictionary<K, V>.Remove(key) by ContainsKey(key) #33797
    Future
  • Document all CI pipelines that can be manually triggered in PRs #71172
    Future
  • Hang calling Environment.FailFast on multiple threads at the same time #72565
  • System.IO.Pipes.Tests test doesnt throw #72587
  • Assert failure: CheckInstrBytePattern(epilogBase[offset] & X86_INSTR_RET, X86_INSTR_RET, epilogBase[offset]) || CheckInstrBytePattern(epilogBase[offset], X86_INSTR_JMP_NEAR_REL32, epilogBase[offset]) || CheckInstrWord(*PTR_WORD(epilogBase + offset), X86_INSTR_w_JMP_FAR_IND_IMM) #68431
    7.0.0
  • Recent Android test refactor broke HttpStress builds #72598
    7.0.0
  • System.Net.Mail in .net 6 is almost 5 times slower compared to .net 4.7.2 #72555
    7.0.0
  • PipeReader.ReadAsync can return empty segments #30786
    7.0.0
  • Http3Request SendAsync cancellation #71922
    7.0.0
  • EnC: ExecutionEngineException after edit in struct returning method #46274
    7.0.0
  • System.IO.Pipes.Tests.NamedPipeTest_ServerInOut_ClientInOut_Synchronous.ClonedServer_ActsAsOriginalServer test hang #72608
  • No warning when trimming an app with built-in COM enabled #66975
    7.0.0
  • Test failure System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SocketsHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_Cancellation_Test_Http2.Expect100Continue_WaitsExpectedPeriodOfTimeBeforeSendingContent #66632
    7.0.0
  • Assertion failed. Unexpected exception type for connection failure when some Http tests time out #62508
    7.0.0
  • `string.StartsWith` with `OrdinalIgnoreCase` appears to become `Equals` after optimization #72550
    7.0.0
  • SocketException (10060) in HTTP 1.1 stress tests #59086
    7.0.0
  • Hang in NamedPipeTest_ServerOut_ClientIn_Synchronous.ClonedServer_ActsAsOriginalServer #72581
    Future
  • Hang in Http1CloseResponseStreamConformanceTests.ReadAsync_CancelPendingTask_ThrowsCancellationException #72582
  • [Perf] Regression in System.Collections.CtorFromCollection<String>.ConcurrentQueue #56017
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][tests][aot] warning: Unable to compile method in `System.Runtime.Loader.DefaultContext.Tests` #51680
    7.0.0
  • JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_71592 failing #72519
  • [x86] Returning struct from UnmanagedCallersOnly method throws AccessViolationException #72265
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT\\Intrinsics\\TypeIntrinsics_r\\TypeIntrinsics_r.cmd #69976
    7.0.0
  • Serialization is not consistent #72591
  • Developers stuck with .NET 5 need a fix for #43675 in .NET 5 #72540
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/providervalidation/providervalidation/providervalidation.sh #59296
    7.0.0
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Diagnostics #72404
    7.0.0
  • Test failure Microsoft.Extensions.FileProviders.PhysicalFileProviderTests.TokenCallbackInvokedOnFileChange #52631
    7.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_71592/test71592/test71592.sh #72575
    7.0.0
  • Error while building main branch of runtime #71996
  • [NativeAOT] Enum.GetValues(Type) should have an aot safe implementation #72140

PullRequests

Created

  • Add support for Requires in events #72651
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • `LibraryImport` generator `AllowUnsafeBlocks` diagnostic #72650
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add RequiresAccessedThrough test to NativeAOT #72649
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix overflow check for parsing format strings #72647
    area-System.Numerics
  • Add analyzer support to validate the stateless marshaller shapes #72643
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 7.0.0
  • Add X509AuthorityKeyIdentifierExtension #72640
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Enabling some tests back onto the Interpreted engine #72639
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Port the doc changes to source #72638
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Clear list in Enumerable.Chunk prior to yielding #72637
    area-System.Linq
  • Disable NoStapledOcsp test on Debian 10 for now. #72634
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Bump Intellisense package version to Preview6 #72631
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Ensure JsonTypeInfo does not fail configuration for valid metadata originating from fast-path sourcegen #72630
    area-System.Text.Json, 7.0.0
  • Correct nullable annotation on ICustomTypeDescriptor.GetConverter #72629
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] Move some defaults out of the templates #72626
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • [wasm] Return int from console template #72623
    area-Infrastructure-mono, 7.0.0
  • Fix HttpConnectionPool timers race on disposal #72615
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Change PipeStream's sync I/O cancellation support to avoid blocking CancellationTokenSource.Cancel #72612
    area-System.IO
  • [QUIC] Support for OpenSSL build of MsQuic on Windows (Attempt 2) #72609
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [QUIC] Remove connection state from QuicStream #72599
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Bump terser from 5.14.1 to 5.14.2 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/node-webpack #72584
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution, javascript
  • [LoongArch64] amend the LoongArch64's ABI for GCstress and NullableObject. #72573
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the wrong GCInfo when testing GCStress. #72572
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] Fix hang caused by calling Environment.FailFast on multiple threads #72567
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-coreclr, 6.0.9
  • Add pod names into the area-owners.json file to support querying by pod #72564
    area-Meta

Merged

  • [mono][aot] Don't fail AOT for methods referencing fnptr classes. #72574
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Sync shared code from aspnetcore #72588
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [mono][aot] Pass -mattr=crc32 to opt/llc when sse4.2 is enabled and u… #72579
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Revert "Always use live host" #72628
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Clarified documentation regarding building the Core_Root. #72560
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Support for RequiresAttributeMismatch testing #72496
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Avoid AsyncLocal read in Activity.set_Current when CurrentChanged isn't handled #72621
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Allow not finding attribute data for more cases that we don't care about #72620
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [mono] Pass the pending exception correctly from interp_runtime_invok… #72126
    arch-wasm
  • [RateLimiting] Fix test race with timer #72118
    area-System.Threading, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] bump npm packages, fix lint errors #72600
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.0
  • Add ease of use helpers in X.509 #72500
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation, cryptographic-docs-impact, 7.0.0
  • Assert compiler diagnostics in UpgradeToRegexGeneratorAnalyzerTests and simplify tests #72580
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Sleep infinitely on secondary crashing threads #72618
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Disable NamedPipeTest_ServerInOut_ClientInOut_Synchronous test configuration #72613
    area-System.IO
  • Improve RegexCharClass.Analyze for sets with subtraction #72328
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 7.0.0
  • Fix TwoServerInstances_OnceDisposed_Throws test for non-overlapped I/O #72617
    area-System.IO
  • Fix hang caused by calling Environment.FailFast on multiple threads #72566
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix accidentally removed Add in TypeSpec.AddModifier #72605
    7.0.0
  • Fix minor triple slash comment #72569
    area-System.ComponentModel
  • Fix x86 GCStress race with indirect calls before epilogs #72592
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [wasm] add new interop to the console template #72375
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Clean up #nullable in source #72568
    area-Meta
  • [mono] Fix https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/72519. #72563
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Annotating System.Formats.Asn1 library for Aot #72533
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix HttpStress build #72601
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Add TranslateKey to PartitionedRateLimiter #69407
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Avoid empty segments from PipeReader.ReadAsync #72536
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, 7.0.0
  • Disable long running ReadAsync_CancelPendingTask_ThrowsCancellationException tests for some Http1 cases #72596
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: hash lookup vn func before trying to optimize #72576
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Warn on trimming with COM hosting (built-in COM support) enabled #72493
    area-Host
  • Do not assume return type ABIs match in `RETURN(CALL)` #72285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Enable string properties evaluation of Length and Char[]. #67028
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: Move cpblk GC ref layout check back to lowering #72516
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix "cns".StartsWith bug #72558
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • [Mono]: Fix infrequent infinite loop on Mono EventPipe streaming thread. #72517
    area-Tracing-mono
  • Remove code duplication in TarHeader class #72501
    area-System.IO, 7.0.0
  • Fix flaky PhysicalFileProviderTests #72553
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • Add markdown readme for System.Reflection.Metadata #71925
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata, community-contribution
  • JIT: speed up VNPairForFunc #72527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Introduce a default synchronization context for wasm #72652
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Add TieredPGO and ReadyToRun to Microsoft-Windows-DotNETRuntime/TieredCompilation/Settings event #72056
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Fix debugger funceval deadlock #72179
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Simplify AppModel addToProject settings #72072
    area-Meta
  • Refactor wasmappbuilder's System.Text.Json reference to use a versions.props property #70582
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, needs-author-action
  • [release/6.0][mono] add 400 band workloads #72379
  • NativeAOT: Guarded devirtualization #64497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS] Enable Diagnostics.Tracing tests #72545
  • Finds logger field in related types #71308
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • Add `UnscopedRefAttribute` #72499
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 7.0.0
  • Make RateLimiterOptions follow Options pattern #72530
    area-System.Threading
  • [wasm-ep] Implement DiagnosticServer and startup sessions for WebAssembly #72482
    arch-wasm, area-Tracing-mono
  • [RateLimiting] Add statistics API #72306
    area-System.Threading, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Tear down pending HTTP connection when the originating request completes #71785
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • [debugger] First draft of managed debugger on wasi #67272
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [NativeAOT] Some cleanup of assembly helpers in hijack area. #72542
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: teach VN to fold type comparisons #72136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize the SqlGuid struct #72549
    area-System.Data.SqlClient, community-contribution
  • Bump terser from 5.10.0 to 5.14.2 in /src/mono/sample/wasm/browser-webpack #72528
    area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution, javascript, 8.0.0
  • [Mono][Arm64] Instrinsify methods for Vector4 on Arm64 #72124
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Fix SerialPort memory leak when requests time out and no data is received #68014
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Simplify UpgradeToRegexGenerator #72538
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • Rename [RegexGenerator] to [Regex] #72434
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Update wasm related README #71951
    arch-wasm, area-Meta, community-contribution
  • X86 assert fix #72505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [WIP] Fixing the per object hard limit support for regions #72229
    area-GC-coreclr
  • HTTP/3 Improved message for failing QUIC connection #72374
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Use locateFile to resolve path for assets outside of remoteSources #69441
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, community-contribution
  • [release/6.0] [mono][jit] Fix an infinite loop in the abcrem pass. #72504
    Servicing-consider, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 6.0.x
  • [Unix] Console.ReadKey rewrite #72193
    area-System.Console, 7.0.0
  • Improve Interop.Sys.ReadLink error handling #72258
    area-System.IO, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • [wasm] improve startup #72275
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • JIT: Remove GT_NULLCHECK #71707
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add support for int keyed dictionaries to configuration binder #71609
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Consolidate importer spilling code #72291
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold `TYP_STRUCT` indirect access to promoted locals #71584
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Don't create mismatched block copies in `cpblk` import #71160
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Delete `lvVerTypeInfo` #71597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Morph `ASG(ONE_FLD_STRUCT, CALL)` using `BITCAST` #61049
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable NI_Vector256_Create on AVX1 #72522
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fixes overwrite of last captured managed stack frame address in EvenPipe stack trace. #72362
    EventPipe, area-Tracing-coreclr, area-Tracing-mono
  • Add reference assembly for System.Private.CoreLib.dll #72143
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Delete `lvOverlappingFields` #72356
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Fixing PhysicalFilesWatcher path maintenance (Issue #71386) #72041
    area-Extensions-FileSystem, community-contribution
  • Issue71025 test #72154
    area-System.Transactions, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Bump LLVM packages to 14.x #72272
    NO-MERGE, area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
